text: Good odds but not as much options for accumulators. . Maybe it'll change when more games are back on. . I like number of goals acca, multi option bet builder, or just a general 6 fold result and both teams to score. Brilliant card though which is easy to use and allows you to access winnings instantly :)

Great experience with PP so far. Bet on the world cup a couple of years ago and I was SO glad that their bets didn't include extra time! The app is easy to use and it's easy to retrieve your details. I only place a couple of bets a year so I do tend to forget my password.

Mostly its a good app. However dont ask for anything unless u have a screenshot. Because its Betfair u speak to due to obviously pp lay their bets off with them. Some races dont show even when qualified. And even when a pop up saying 5 ,free spins if u dont get em again screenshot. How do they not know their own promotion's. Even email links they still asking for it wth

Good odds on this easy to navigate app, even me at 49 years young have managed to understand. On my first week of joining I received a beautiful pair of paddy power pants. Love the bonuses handed out and so far in a little bit of profit.

No search option for teams. Also there should more options for European football leagues such as Norwegian and Danish games and should be easier to find. Paddy power needs to step up it's game app wise as it doesn't measure up to bet 365 and William hill

Do NOT deposit any funds until you have verified your identity. I deposited funds then they wouldn't accept my ways of verifying my account and had my account suspended and my money frozen with no way of withdrawing it!
It was absolutely dreadful on the virtuals it kept saying no more bets at least 30 seconds early and I have proof the lag and quality is just poor

I find your app fricken annoying to operate when betting on football and slow when you need to place a quick bet on horse racing... your despositing on slots never works and jumps around on mobile and when you go to type in figures you wish to deposit it closes... leading you to close the game you are in the middle of playing where you can loose bonus positions on certain games! The app is two bob i dunno why i spend so much money on it!
Enjoy the king Kong game. Fun games had a little bit back. App easy to use and they always give free bets or money back on some races etc.
Best of the betting platforms. I have used a few more but always return to Paddy Power. Also great for free bets! Well done.
Easy to use, but some glitches and had issues with free bet offers, only use it couple of times a year, good enough for that

Ever since the in app changes,,theres a lot of glitches now,like not showing the scores,only saying in play..not as good as it was, it wasnt broken so no need to fit it and mess it up,and I have a new Samsung A70,,so nit an old phone..
Been very slow since the last update. By the time I load a 5f race it's finished!! Also can't see my altered potential winnings now based on results to b see whether worth cashing out
replyText:
Hi Gillian,

Thank you for your feedback and sorry for the inconvenience caused by this issue for you. Please contact us by phone or live help where we can assist you further

Paddy Power Customer Support

text: Never got my 50+ free spins . Deposited a total ¬£35 to receive bonuses and still got nothing, played on slots and used all my cash and no free spins.

Terrible. The worst ever games casino. You never ever win anything. I've played so much money and never win anything. Is just like throw money in the bin. Avoid avoid avoid avoid. Never play this. Keep your money. Is terrible

Over the past few months the app has changed. Sometimes making it very difficult to use. It becomes slow, pressed the wrong selections and the new way of viewing betting slip is annoying... As for odds, bet 365 wins all day.
Not really an app, more a web wrapper. Needs to be improved, slow and clunky.
Good app, easy to use, cash card üí≥for the handiest cashout.
Excellent app easy lay out that makes it better and quicker to find what you want.
Very slow to understand, why is it not like a lotto betting slip to mark 3 draws, have to go out of slip to keep repeating draws over and over
It's very easy and fun to use and I love to gamble it's fun and I've always been a fan of Paddy Power betting
Works well for horse racing, well laid out and results close to future races.

Prices shorter than Boyles, it doesn't tell you how long is gone in any Gaa and rugby games in running. Could be 20mins or 60 mins gone this is ridiculous. A lot of Gaa games it doesn't give you points option.
Really easy to navigate and lots of info, simply the best

The cash out on horse racing is on a different window and by the time you look at cash out the race is over, totally useless, the horse meetings at gulfstream does not tell you at what distance they are running at each race, absaloutley rubbish.
Horrible navigation and very laggy at all times. Also inputting bets and changing them can take forever
Spot on for racing. You can cash out half way through
Cannot work out why when I choose my irish lottery numbers it won't let me choose also hard to work out how to use just pressing anything and hoping for the best
Easy to use, better odds, more places & good special offers, quality.
Nice smooth app. Quick payouts and good information on horses. Bang on
Simple and straight forward. Easy to use and quick pay outs.
Joined on Thursday already withdrawn ¬£200 from paddy specials. 5/1 on 3 teams both times. ¬£20 to play with after. app is easy to use. good choice to change company
As usual clear ,positive information, and free bet awards
Everything in one place. Can play my lottery and bingo all on one app.

This is the wrose sporting app it slow and it Laggs and it don't show the scores on the app so it impossible to know if your team are winning, the cash out never works and my teams was winning avoid this app ladbrokes is better
App has got very slow cashing out is a tiring effort, trying to place bets is slow wrong teams or horses picked slowing the whole process.
Have tried other betting sites but always prefer PP Easy to use and informative with good odds and extras.
Abit slow glitching, cleared my betting slip list once made a bet had to do selection all over again. Cant imagine experience in play. Hopefully better experience.
Good app but handicap betting is not always obvious, especially when you are putting a last minute bet on.
Quick and easy. Hasn't crashed on busy days yet
Unbearably slow. To the point where the app is barely usable. Once the money is spent in my account i'll probably find another bookies to use
Not enough user interface during game, I only use the app for football betting.
Good app with a great selection of bets. I lose more then I win but I stick within my budget so there's no problems.
Easy to use, great offers, fast payout. A+++
Dreadfully slow, didn't let me cash out in time and it always take too long to settle bets. Not going to use anymore
Great app, never won anything or ever had a free bonus but it is a good app
Excellent app loads quickly and easy to navigate and good odds. Withdrawing takes only 2 days.
Slow unable to log o quickly better using website instead of app
Absolutely dreadful screen sizes, really dreadful on the virtuals, unless you're an owl.
It's easy to get around different pages for sport betting and very good all round
